description: Greenery around a charming manor provides a backdrop for a colorful array of flowers taking shelter under a grove of assorted fruit trees.  Burbling brightly, a multi-tiered riverstone fountain with crystal clear water cascading down its surface is surrounded by three carved benches, and a path of round, grey stones meanders up a small hill to the steps of a gazebo, then down to a stunningly azure pond.  Serving as the ever-moving focal center of the garden, a muster of regal, vibrantly plumed peacocks struts amongst the verdure.

Bathed in soft moonlight, a large riverstone manor is surrounded by verdant greenery and a fragrant array of flowers and fruit trees. Moonbeams bounce off of a burbling stone fountain surrounded by three carved benches, and a path of round, grey stones meanders up a small hill to the gazebo steps, then down to a dark azure pond. Occupying the ever-moving focal center of the garden, a muster of regal peacocks struts amongst the verdure, their colors eye-catching beneath the stars.
title: [Cairnfang Manor, Garden]
